name: bbPress Mentions Email Notifications
author: Samuel Elh

sections.description:
Does the same functionality as BuddyPress, emailing users who get mentioned in a bbPress topic or reply. The aim of this plugin is when to enable that feature when no BuddyPress is there.
To do: – warn user about bbPress/BuddyPress presence
sections.installation:
• Install and activate the plugin:
  1. Upload the plugin to your plugins directory, or use the WordPress installer.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Credits go to @wpweaver (https://profiles.wordpress.org/wpweaver) for reporting this bug (see https://wordpress.org/support/?p=8853689), fixed a permalinks bug. Now fetching the topic/reply permalinks with bbPress API.
  • Now translation ready
  • Other minor improvements involving settings and performance.

1.0.1

  • Fixed a class fatal error.

1.0

  • Rewrote plugin for better performance, and increased minimum PHP version support.

0.1

  • Initial release.
